CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Referral_Source_Business_Type__c)='Accounting Firm' || TEXT(Referral_Source_Business_Type__c)='Strategic Accountant Firm',IF(Today() - Profiled_Date__c <= 365,IF(TEXT(Number_of_Business_Clients_with_EEs__c)='101+' ||TEXT(Number_of_Business_Clients_with_EEs__c)='51 to 100' ,'High' ,IF(TEXT(Number_of_Business_Clients_with_EEs__c)='26 to 50' ,'Medium' ,IF(TEXT(Number_of_Business_Clients_with_EEs__c)='1 to 25' ,'Low' ,IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Number_of_Business_Clients_with_EEs__c))||TEXT(Number_of_Business_Clients_with_EEs__c)='None' , IF(TEXT(Ref_s_to_Payroll_HCM_in_last_12_mos__c)='100+'||TEXT(Ref_s_to_Payroll_HCM_in_last_12_mos__c)='51 to 99'||TEXT(Ref_s_to_Payroll_HCM_in_last_12_mos__c)='21 to 50','High',IF(TEXT(Ref_s_to_Payroll_HCM_in_last_12_mos__c)='11 to 20' ||TEXT(Ref_s_to_Payroll_HCM_in_last_12_mos__c)='6 to 10','Medium', IF(TEXT(Ref_s_to_Payroll_HCM_in_last_12_mos__c)='1 to 5' ,'Low',IF(TEXT(Ref_s_to_Payroll_HCM_in_last_12_mos__c)='0','None',IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Ref_s_to_Payroll_HCM_in_last_12_mos__c)),'Unknown',''))))),'')))),'Unverified'), IF(TEXT(Referral_Source_Business_Type__c)='Bank', IF(Today() - Bank_Profiled_Date__c <= 365, IF(TEXT(Total_of_business_accounts_households__c)='1001+','High', IF(TEXT(Total_of_business_accounts_households__c)='501-1000' || TEXT(Total_of_business_accounts_households__c)='250-500','Medium',IF(TEXT(Total_of_business_accounts_households__c)='1-249','Low', 'Unknown'))), 'Unverified'), ''))
CustomField.label: Referral Source Potential
